Experience Fluxion

Build with Code ‚Äã

Fluxion allows you to write Python code to generate high-quality animations.

python
from fluxion import *

class CreateLogo(Scene):
    def construct(self):
        logo = FluxionLogo()
        self.play(DrawBorderThenFill(logo))
        self.play(logo.animate.shift(UP * 0.5))
